1466080.name: Chicken Police - Paint it RED! - Original Soundtrack
1466080.description: Experience the sound of Chicken Police - Paint it RED! with the memorable score from composer Laszlo Vincze. Chicken Police - Paint it RED! - Original Soundtrack features 20 songs that set the mood for a hardboiled noir detective story ...or just pour yourself a drink, because there is nothing more NOIR than a smooth jazz tune to ponder the dark abyss that is your life. It's a cluckin' masterpiece!
